column4: hi I installed ndiswrapper and the drivers for my wireless card but it seems ndiswrapper and wireless card drivers with it give me worse connection than the built in ones on ubuntu. So how do I reverse this and go back to ubuntus rt2500pci drivers?

hi I installed ndiswrapper and the drivers for my wireless card but it seems ndiswrapper and wireless card drivers with it give me worse connection than the built in ones on ubuntu. So how do I reverse this and go back to ubuntus rt2500pci drivers?

hi I installed ndiswrapper and the drivers for my wireless card but it seems ndiswrapper and wireless card drivers with it give me worse connection than the built in ones on ubuntu. So how do I reverse this and go back to ubuntus rt2500pci drivers?
You'll want to uninstall ndiswrapper. If you used apt, you can do sudo apt-get remove ndiswrapper-utils. So long as you didn't uninstall or disable the orginal drivers, ubuntu will fall back to them.
